room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hotel" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: I did the haunted hotel and loved it. First time doing an escape room and will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hotel" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: Just got back from doing the Haunted Hotel escape. Not only was the room fun and challenging, but it's easily the best production value of any escape room I've been to. I've been to some rooms where it looked like they bought all their props at a dollar store. That's not this! The quality of the sets & props are amazing and consistent with anything you see in high end haunted houses or escape room game shows like Hellevator.Can't wait to go back & take on another room!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hotel" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: Went through the haunted hotel yesterday and it was amazing! So many puzzles. One of the best escapes I've ever experienced. The story line was complete, the clues were easy to follow, and just the right amount of surprise and difficulty. Our group of 5 made it out with 4 minutes to spare! Wish we had time to do all the rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hotel" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: Had an absolute blast in Haunted Hotel!! Awesome effects and great decor. Our guide, Chris, was very fun and made our adventure that much more enjoyable. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hotel" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: Did the Haunted Hotel and had a blast! Would definitely visit again.
